<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/452143c6bf0dcf76ef415281b0e4fbc3edff4b6b|patch 8.2.1220: memory access error when dragging a popup window>
patch 8.2.1220: memory access error when dragging a popup window

Problem:    memory access error when dragging a popup window over a buffer
            with folding.
Solution:   Avoid going over the end of the cache. (closes #6438)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1220: memory access error when dragging a popup window · vim/vim@452143c
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1220: memory access error when dragging a popup window · vim/vim@452143c
attachments.text: Problem: memory access error when dragging a popup window over a buffer with folding. Solution: Avoid going over the end of the cache. (closes #6438)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/02f9e6a60f9851046154ccf2ac170f25a0b3cc7d|patch 8.2.1221: memory leak when updating popup window>
patch 8.2.1221: memory leak when updating popup window

Problem:    Memory leak when updating popup window.
Solution:   Clear search highlighting.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1221: memory leak when updating popup window · vim/vim@02f9e6a
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1221: memory leak when updating popup window · vim/vim@02f9e6a
attachments.text: Problem: Memory leak when updating popup window. Solution: Clear search highlighting.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/657a826c07b4ea3f8846b6acb2c50b82c2d81e50|patch 8.2.1222: using valgrind in Vim command started by test doesn't…>
patch 8.2.1222: using valgrind in Vim command started by test doesn't work

Problem:    When using valgrind a Vim command started by a test uses the same
            log file name which gets overwritten.
Solution:   Fix regexp to rename the log file.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1222: using valgrind in Vim command started by test doesn't… · vim/vim@657a826
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1222: using valgrind in Vim command started by test doesn't… · vim/vim@657a826
attachments.text: … work Problem: When using valgrind a Vim command started by a test uses the same log file name which gets overwritten. Solution: Fix regexp to rename the log file.

patch 8.2.1223: Vim9: invalid type error for function default value

Problem:    Vim9: invalid type error for function default value.
Solution:   Use right argument index. (closes #6458)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1223: Vim9: invalid type error for function default value · vim/vim@e30f64b
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1223: Vim9: invalid type error for function default value · vim/vim@e30f64b
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: invalid type error for function default value. Solution: Use right argument index. (closes #6458)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a90afb9a590c92d537faeb16f9ccd282fc78aeff|patch 8.2.1224: Vim9: arguments from partial are not used>
patch 8.2.1224: Vim9: arguments from partial are not used

Problem:    Vim9: arguments from partial are not used.
Solution:   Put the partial arguments on the stack. (closes #6460)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1224: Vim9: arguments from partial are not used · vim/vim@a90afb9
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1224: Vim9: arguments from partial are not used · vim/vim@a90afb9
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: arguments from partial are not used. Solution: Put the partial arguments on the stack. (closes #6460)
